nodes.text: Niquon's sanctuary was located in the mountains of Skalokor, near to the Dolandu settlement of Stomorr. The Jedi Master Niquon lived there for some years, training his apprentice Nason Laric. The sanctuary had shielding that blocked communications signals. When a local Dolandu brought a malfunctioning droid to Niquon, the shielding meant that the droid was unable to transmit its position to its owner.
